title: @RIOT Regarding: The Magnificent Twisted fate
body:
How does it qualify as a legendary skin?
its price is 1820

And according to riot:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752874-Guide-to-Skin-Price-Tiers

1820 skins are supposed to "completely change the look and feel of a champion." and include the following points that 'The magnificent Twisted fate' lacks

The Magnificent twisted fate, lacks:
particle effects changes 
a new voice over and sounds 
new animations

i know that it was made in a time where standards were not as high as they are now for legendary skins
but other skins have had price changes in the meantime, (sad robot ammumu as an example) and even even though it is a legacy skin, it does still get sold on occasion, and so should not be exempt from the rules governing skins.

so i call for either a complete rework 
or 
change the price to 750 RP which is the category into which it fits.

(i actually own the skin and enjoy it, so this isn't a "but i dont wanna pay that much, waaaa waaa waaa" because i have already paid that money. its just a general breach of standards that i am responding to)

please at least change his cards to tarot cards like it shows in the splash art, hell even High Noon TF changes the card's visuals. and its half the price.

replies.body:
> i know that it was made in a time where standards were not as high as they are now for legendary skins
but other skins have had price changes in the meantime, (sad robot ammumu as an example) and even even though it is a legacy skin, it does still get sold on occasion, and so should not be exempt from the rules governing skins. 

People like you amaze me. He already knows.

Long ago we used to suggest particles and changes to it among TF mains... For example one of my suggestion included Destiny have him appear from under a cylinder hat rather than a fan of cards.
Eventually, Rito retired the skin and declared it wouldn't have been changed.
I guess we'll have to wait for TF's future total revamp, someday.
I agree with this. Why would anyone buy this skin now? Lucky I got mine from Mystery Gift :P
It's the length of the name :)
